description: An handwritten set of notes detailing an alchemical recipe for extra strength aspirin.  The active ingredient is apparently hallucinogenic, which is certainly one way to stop from feeling pain.

An handwritten set of notes detailing an alchemical recipe for a pill to cure minor illnesses.  You're not looking forward to getting that royal jelly now that you've seen what the bees are like lately.
An handwritten set of notes detailing an alchemical recipe for some kind of energy drink.  You do a double-take when you see just how caffeine and alcohol you're supposed to add to the recipe.
An handwritten set of notes detailing an alchemical recipe for an insecticide.  "WEAR MASK DURING BREWING!!!!!" is written at the bottom of the recipe
An handwritten set of notes detailing an alchemical recipe for an extremely powerful hallucinogen.  The end product will supposedly allow you to "see through time".
